data.comment: The match is underway at Stade Gaston Gerard.
The match is underway at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Free kick Dijon.
In Dijon Dijon attack through Frederic Sammaritano. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Dijon.
Ball safe as Toulouse is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Dijon in their own half.
Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
Corner awarded to Dijon.
Ball goes out of play for a Toulouse goal kick.
Toulouse advance rapidly upfield but Jerome Brisard blows for offside.
Throw-in for Toulouse at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Toulouse in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Max Gradel (Toulouse) has received a first yellow card.
Mama Balde (Dijon) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Toulouse in the half of Dijon.
Dijon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dijon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dijon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Efthymis Koulouris is booked for the away team.
Dijon's Julio Tavares breaks free at Stade Gaston Gerard. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Jerome Brisard awards Toulouse a goal kick.
Free kick for Toulouse in the half of Dijon.
Toulouse are pushing forward but Max Gradel's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Dijon at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Free kick for Toulouse in their own half.
Can Dijon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toulouse's half?
Jerome Brisard signals a Toulouse throw-in in Dijon's half.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
Jerome Brisard awards the home team a throw-in.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Toulouse.
Stephy Mavididi (Dijon) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Toulouse in their own half.
In Dijon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Dijon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Toulouse's half?
Dijon's Julio Tavares attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Dijon have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
Throw-in Toulouse.
Toulouse have a goal kick.
Dijon's Mama Balde gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Toulouse at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Throw-in Toulouse.
Toulouse awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Dijon in their own half.
Goal! Hamza Mendyl gives Dijon a 1-0 lead.
Great play from Frederic Sammaritano to set up the goal.
Quentin Boisgard gets an equalizer for Toulouse. The score is now 1-1.
Efthymis Koulouris instrumental with a fine assist.
Jerome Brisard awards the away team a throw-in.
Toulouse have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
Toulouse drive upfield and Kouadio Kone gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Dijon defender.
Toulouse awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Toulouse in their own half.
Throw-in for Dijon at Stade Gaston Gerard.
The first half has been concluded at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Hamza Mendyl (Dijon) has received a yellow card from Jerome Brisard.
The second half has started at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Ball safe as Dijon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Toulouse at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Toulouse have a goal kick.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
Throw-in Toulouse.
Hamza Mendyl (Dijon) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Dijon.
Throw-in for Dijon close to the penalty box.
Wesley Lautoa (Dijon) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Toulouse's Max Gradel gets in a shot on goal at Stade Gaston Gerard. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Toulouse in their own half.
In Dijon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Nayef Aguerd puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
Ball goes out of play for a Dijon goal kick.
Dijon have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
Dijon to take a throw-in in Toulouse territory.
Jerome Brisard awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
Toulouse awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Toulouse in their own half.
In Dijon, Dijon push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Dijon.
Ball safe as Toulouse is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Dijon are in shooting range from this free kick.
Nayef Aguerd of Dijon gets in a strike, but is off target.
Jerome Brisard awards Toulouse a goal kick.
Free kick for Toulouse in the half of Dijon.
Toulouse make their first substitution with Yaya Sanogo replacing Max Gradel.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Toulouse.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Dijon.
Corner awarded to Dijon.
Throw-in for Toulouse in the half of Dijon.
Toulouse attack but Wesley Said's header doesn't find the target.
Jerome Brisard awards Dijon a goal kick.
Stephane Jobard (Dijon) is making a first substitution, with Romain Amalfitano replacing Stephy Mavididi.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Toulouse awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dijon are coming forward and Mama Balde gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Throw-in for Toulouse in their own half.
Dijon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jhonder Cadiz is replacing Frederic Sammaritano for the home team.
Amine Adli is on a sub for Quentin Boisgard for Toulouse.
Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
Romain Amalfitano of Dijon smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Dijon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Dijon at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Can Toulouse get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dijon's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Dijon goal kick.
Dijon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dijon are whistled for offside.
Jerome Brisard awards the away team a throw-in.
Aaron Leya Iseka is replacing Wesley Said for Toulouse at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Toulouse to take a throw-in in Dijon territory.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Dijon in Dijon.
The home team replace Mama Balde with Florent Balmont.
Ball safe as Toulouse is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Dijon's [49] misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Toulouse at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
Free kick Toulouse.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
Jerome Brisard signals a throw-in for Dijon, close to Toulouse's area.
Toulouse have a goal kick.
Throw-in Dijon.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
